DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate gastrointestinal tolerance oral nutritional supplement contain new protein blend healthy elderly subject .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study meet follow inclusion criterion : 1 . Age ≥ 60 ≤ 90 year 2 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 20 < 35 Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : 1 . History diabetes 2 . Currently take take antibiotic within 1 week prior enrollment 3 . Major surgery le 3 month prior enrollment study 4 . Current active malignant disease treat within last 6 month cancer 5 . Immunodeficiency disorder 6 . Myocardial infarction within last 3 month prior enrollment 7 . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) 8 . Allergy ingredient study product 9 . Aversion flavor product test 10 . Obstruction gastrointestinal tract preclude ingestion absorption study product , inflammatory bowel disease , ulcer , gastric reflux disease , short bowel syndrome , major gastrointestinal disease 11 . Dementia , brain metastasis , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder 12 . Pursuing unintentional weight loss weight gain ≥ 5 % last 4 week 13 . Medications/dietary supplements/substances could profoundly modulate metabolism affect GI motility
